phrases: A tall, tall wall looms in front of me.
What is the view on the other side?
it is a view I could never see on my own.
If I am not doing it alone...
I just might be able to see it.
Episode 1 Let us Go To Tokyo!!
Asahi likes his tosses a little... higher.
It is funny how you keep falling for that.
Which will it be this time?
We are going to stop it!
Let us play one more set, please!
Guys, playing until you drop is not the answer.
Captain, you need to tell these guys
I have not practiced hitting enough...
You guys are still going to practice?
We have still got to clean up,
They are all definitely realizing their own potential,
so that is enough for today!
but what our team lacks is experience.
Hey, make sure you cool down properly.
They definitely have not had enough practice matches with other teams.
I cannot count on the neighborhood association being able to show up.
But it will not just be Nekoma this time.
It is a group of schools from the Kanto region that includes Nekoma.
Apparently, they hold practice matches all the time.
This time, because of Coach Nekomata,
Karasuno will also be able to participate in their practice matches.
Groups like that are created through relationships built up over years,
so it is not easy to get in without connections.
We have got to make sure to thank Coach Nekomata.
And Sensei, too, who I am sure kept persistently asking him.
Your name helped a lot, Coach Ukai.
Over the years, we have lost our connections with other schools in the prefecture
that we were once close with.
There are many schools where the coaches
that were once close to the former Coach Ukai are now gone.
We should not miss this chance!
I am going to be able to see that set up in person again.
We are right before a match!
This time, I am going to protect us'til we win!
It might actually be a little cold today.
We are going to take down that City Boy Alliance!
This time, I am going to break through for sure!
their prelims for the Inter-High start this weekend,
so it will not be right away.
Also, at this point, we have only received the invitation.
There are some agreements we have to work out,
but I will tell you all about the details another time.
But it seems that all of you are...
I have got a staff meeting, so I have got to get going.
Ukai-kun, I will leave the rest to you.
It is going to get busy.
You will be busy, too, Shimizu.
This will be your first long trip with us.
I will do my best, too.
Hurry and clean up, then go home!
Do you know any first-years who are not in a club?
and it even has his picture.
Well, he is good enough to play in a national league.
Oikawa's favorite food is milk bread.
His favorite saying is,'If you are going to hit it, hit it until it breaks.'
Third-Years Remain to Take Down Shiratorizawa
Looks like Seijoh wants to take down Shiratorizawa,
so most of the third-years that were regulars are still there.
Come on and bring it, Seijoh!
You are going to rip it!
Shiratorizawa Academy Ushijima Wakatoshi (3rd Year) Wing Spiker
We are going for a run.
Hey... Ushiwaka's in the Youth World.
Simply put, he is representing Japan in the under 19 age group.
Only one high school can represent Miyagi in the spring tournament.
For us to go to nationals,
we will have to defeat Ushiwaka and Oikawa.
Quiz Name: Tanaka Ryunosuke Year 2 Class 1
Quiz Name: Nishinoya Yu Year 2 Class 3
I need to accept it, and think rationally...
Those kids have plenty of guts, so they will be able to do this.
They can do it if they try.
They can do it if they try.
They can do it if they try.
Ten dashes uphill to the halfway mark!
Pretty sure we can just let them go.
You totally went the wrong way somewhere, did not you?
Did you need something from me?
If you do not need anything, I will be leaving.
Would you mind if we did some recon at Shiratorizawa?
Are not you supposed to recon in secret?
The team that uses that weird quick attack?
No matter what your abilities may be,
we will not get weaker just because you watched us.
I am heading back to school now.
If you want to look, follow me.
We are going to defeat you at the spring tournament.
Are you out doing roadwork by yourself?
Do not you dare get a head start!
As expected, he runs at a fast pace.
Are you out for your first walk, you idiot?!
Their school building looks so cool!
What is with this super-huge athletic field?!
Indoor Practice Area Baseball Field Golf Practice Area Tennis Courts
This place is so big they need signs!
The volleyball team has its own bus!
We have lost sight of Ushiwaka-san!
This looks like it might be the volleyball team's gym...
Well, no other high school in the prefecture stands a chance against Shiratorizawa.
They would have to go out of the prefecture
or have a college team come in for it to even count as practice.
I am Kageyama from Karasuno High.
Would you mind if I had a look?
I applied for this school, but was not accepted.
I remember seeing one of your matches from junior high.
We do not need a setter who cannot serve the ace at this school.
You are not really one to serve anyone.
But that goes the same for the Great King, too.
He is the top setter in the prefecture, after all.
Oikawa-san has nothing to do with this!
He should have come to our school.
Are you saying that Oikawa-san would have been able to serve you?
Oikawa is a setter that can bring the absolute best out of his team.
If the team's absolute best is still weak, there is nothing more to be done.
If it is strong, he will make it as strong as possible.
A sapling must have good soil in order to grow strong.
Infertile soil will not bring forth splendid fruit.
Other than Oikawa, everyone at Aoba Johsai is weak.
He is usually pretty scared of strong players he is meeting for the first time.
I apologize if I hit a nerve,
but words from someone who lost to Aoba Johsai and could not even stay in the prefectural finals
I am Hinata Shoyo, from the concrete.
I am going to beat you, and go to nationals.
Hey, are you from another school?
You are not allowed to be here.
Thank you for showing us around.
If Oikawa-san is the best setter in the prefecture,
I am the one who is going to surpass him.
we are a team that could not beat Seijoh, who in turn could not beat Shiratorizawa.
That does not matter, as long as we beat both of them.
We seem to be on the same page.
That is why we are going to Tokyo.
It is best to go up against strong guys if you want to get stronger.
As for our series of away games in Tokyo,
for the time being, it is planned for next month.
we will need permission from your parents or guardians,
so I will hand out those forms later.
We also have tentative consent from the school, as well.
you have final exams starting next month.
So, I think you know what I am getting at,
but if you fail any subjects,
supplementary classes will be held that weekend.
Which means you will not be able to go to the away games.
What happens if we skip our final exams?
Then what happens if you skip those?
Supplementary exams for the supplementary exams?
We will just take the tests after the away games!
If you try to feign being sick, you will not be able to go to the away games, either.
Next time on Haikyu!! : Direct Sunlight.
